src:
Statistik Laga Vitoria Guimares vs Arsenal: Meriam London yang Melempem di Portugal
07 Nov 2019, 02:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal gagal menuai kemenangan saat melawat ke markas Vitoria Guimares dalam rangka laga lanjutan Liga Europa, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam kemarin. Skuat besutan Unai Emery tersebut hanya mampu meraih hasil imbang 1-1.
Pertandingan sudah berjalan dengan cukup berat bagi para pemain Arsenal. Kedudukan imbang 0-0 bahkan bertahan sampai pertandingan memasuki menit ke-80.
Shkodran Mustafi sempat membuat harapan dengan golnya yang memanfaatkan umpan terukur dari Nicolas Pepe. Sayang, keunggulan tersebut tak bertahan lama karena Duarte da Silva berhasil mencetak gol balasan pada masa injury time.
Pertandingan kali ini juga menghasilkan beberapa catatan penting, salah satunya adalah torehan buruk Arsenal selama bermain di markas klub Portugal. Informasi lengkap yang disadur dari BBC Sport bisa disimak di bawah ini.
text:
Action Statistics Vitoria Guimares vs Arsenal: The London Cannon That Has Sizzled in Portugal
Nov 7 2019, 02:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal failed to reap victory when a visit to the headquarters of Vitoria Guimares in the context of the match continued Europa League, Wednesday (11/06/2019) last night. Unai Emery's squad was only able to achieve a 1-1 draw.
The game has been going pretty hard for Arsenal players. The 0-0 draw even lasted until the match entered the 80th minute.
Shkodran Mustafi made a wish with his goal that made use of measurable passes from Nicolas Pepe. Unfortunately, these advantages did not last long because Duarte da Silva managed to score a goal back during injury time.
This match also produced several important notes, one of which was a bad score from Arsenal while playing at the club's Portuguese headquarters. Detailed information adapted from BBC Sport can be seen below.
